wikipedia_page.main: Captain Edward Charles Ellice (1 January 1858 – 21 February 1934) was Liberal MP for St Andrews Burghs.

response: *Edward Charles Ellice (1858–1934), cousin of the second, Liberal MP for St Andrews Burghs

The local Liberal Association selected 45-year-old Captain Edward Charles Ellice as their candidate to gain the seat. He was cousin and heir of Edward Ellice, a previous MP for the constituency.Who Was Who
* Edward Charles Ellice (1858–1934), British Liberal Party politician
